subject: Football
lead_paragraph: At 25, Michael Lewis was driving a truck for Budweiser, delivering kegs to bars and house parties. At 35, he is returning kickoffs for the Saints, defying both age and reason.
snippet: At 25, Michael Lewis was driving a truck for Budweiser, delivering kegs to bars and house parties. At 35, he is returning kickoffs for the Saints, defying both age and reason.
